io.spine.server.bus

Interface Listener<E extends MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of envelopes of messages posted to the bus
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Consumer<E>

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Listener<E extends MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>
extends java.util.function.Consumer<E>
    A listener receives a message when it is posted to a Bus before it is processed by filters.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.function.Consumer

        accept, andThen
